Records and CDs

A fantastic mix of early junk noise, post-punk mayhem, Dadaist buffoonery, and sonic experimentation.

Buy a copy here!

This is the third album of the Japanese noise band Hanatarash. Noise music at its finest, holding no punches.

Buy a copy here!

A much quieter and more electronic later release from Hanatarash. It sounds like you’re in the turbines of a space ship.

Buy a copy here!

T-Shirts

Our first t-shirt design! Stand out from the crowd in our, now infamous, 'Bulldozer gig' image from Osaka, 1989.

Buy a t-shirt here!

Our second t-shirt design! Stand out from the crowd with our signature logo design surrounded by Eye's lyrics and poems.

Our second t-shirt design! Stand out from the crowd with our signature logo design. Let everyone know that your like life noisy!

Books and Badges

A collection of Eye's drawings and collages, drawing as much from Japanese mythology as from his musical influences. His work aims to complement the music as well as to provide another dimension to the sound.

Buy a copy here!

Working with a range of media including found objects, t-shirts, drawing and photography, he creates collages with artificial and natural elements, pop cultural trash and psychedelic shamanism.

Buy a copy here!

A bold, bright, 2-inch badge featuring our class Hanatarash logo! Wear it on your jacket or on your hat. Tap it on a table to create your own noise show.
The possibilities are endless.

Buy a badge here!
